author: Diana Tourjée, Michelle Garcia
title: What It's Like to Be Quarantined, Isolated, and Gender Dysphoric
description: Many transgender Americans have been cut off from essential hormones, surgeries, and support.
content: Like a lot of people across the country and around the world, Hannah, a trans woman, is self-isolating at home because of the COVID-19 global pandemic. Unable to afford to stay in New York City, Hannah, whose name has been changed to protect her identity, rel… [+6185 chars]
